p: Compounds 70 and 74 were assayed for their antimicrobial activities against S. aureus, B. cereus, B. subtillis, P. aeruginosa, and K. pneumonia. The results showed that compounds 70 and 74 displayed weak antimicrobial effects with the same MIC value of 100 µg/mL against B. subtillis and S. aureus. Ampicillin was used as positive control with MIC values of 8 µg/mL and 3.5 µg/mL against S. aureus and B. subtillis [ 32].
